method.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add garlic and onions and fry for 2 min or until softened. Add pepper and mushrooms and fry for a further 3 min, stirring frequently. Add tomatoes, wine, olives, seasoning and parsley. Bring to boil then simmer gently for 5 min.
Lightly grease a large ovenproof dish. Season the inside of the fish thoroughly then arrange in the dish. Pour over the onion, pepper and tomato mixture.
Cover with a lid or foil. Bake for 15-20 min or until fish flakes easily. Serve immediately.
